html:
7.15.18  8:38 am   what colour would you want te alienz to be +

     surprise me

      are we actually v much a purple hybrid colour but just cant see ourselves as we really are cos our view of the colour spectrum isn't 100% quality enough }://// 

     no

7.15.18  8:16 am   why does sex feel good

     that's because of all the babies you can make

7.15.18  7:54 am   what is the most fascinating thing that happened to you today?

     i implicitly agreed to someone's use of cookies, without even knowing

7.15.18  5:31 am   why is, and why have we?

     well someone's gotta do it

7.15.18  4:32 am   Could you please explain the "Now hiring all positions" sign?

     no

7.15.18  3:42 am   Okay: More Than Words. I have always felt very uncomfortable about the chord progression in the chorus... it all feels very weird but amazing within the context of the song (specially that I7 to the IV then to the -IV and back on track with normal I). What's your take on it? Does the song strike as "normal" all around or what? Sometimes I try to figure out how does that song work so well and just can't.

     i think that's the most normal part but the rest is kind of weird

7.15.18  1:55 am   Is there a fruit you think should be a vegetable 

     passion

7.15.18  1:32 am   i abducted some aliens

     oh that was nice of you

7.15.18  1:09 am   can i live

     yes

7.15.18  12:22 am   There is a problem to ask a question on mobile devices. After typing a long question button "ASK" goes inside the textarea and then, after a few words, disappears. It appears again only after changing screen position. Wish you could fix that.

     i probably can but first i need to know which device you have. if you can tell me through email that would be best so we can properly trouble shoot the problem

7.15.18  12:14 am   So, after reading this section, I cought some general statements:
1) Travel anywhere
2) Do whatever the heck you want do and like do

Is there more points, or I got all of them?

     you could also try to help others do things

7.14.18  11:13 pm   oh !!! i think i may have solved the puzzle. before you were a human, you didn't know about Life. and once you die, you will go on to "the next level," youve said. and what you do in life seems to affect what your next level is like, i also remember you saying. very mysterious, this next level, which certainly seems a lot like life, except that it isnt life as we know it. but it's similar in the way that you didn't know about life until you found yourself with it. hmm. jeez actually maybe i dont get it. am i in the ballpark?

     i think you are looking at it as sort of a 1 time climb, where as it seems to me if it were a 1 time climb, chances are it would be already over or not started yet. and yet here we are, right in the middle of it, every time

7.14.18  10:02 pm   what are our obligations as human beings?

     continue to make higher and higher quality poetry until it solves every mystery of modern science

7.14.18  8:36 pm   How can I have the drive to make work that I know people aren't going to see

     if that's what you want

7.14.18  8:29 pm   wht's the best thing since slinced bread

     cold hard cash!

7.14.18  6:56 pm   sometimes i know i'm not finished with a project, but i don't know where i'm going or how to get there. how do you recommend dealing with obstacles in creative work without giving up? 

     sounds like it's time for a twist

7.14.18  6:30 pm   How do I improve my skills in drawing and music when I have no confidence in myself?

     you could blame your drawings on someone else for a while

7.14.18  5:53 pm   can the song/lyrics/anything i am trying to write ever be like the vision of it as i have?

     sure

     or is the vision just like a magnet that is constanly getting further

     if you continue to write more it will be a magnet that gets closer

7.14.18  4:04 pm   what was your inspiration for snail time video?

     after the "thinkin bout doing some content" video, i had a video planned that was just supposed to be the content. something just contently happening, self explanatorily. but while making the 'content' video (the one with the car) i suddenly had a few extra ideas for it (the pause, the analysis, the ending jingle, etc) which is fun but it means that video would no longer fulfill the role that was planned. so the snail video was written as a replacement

7.14.18  4:03 pm   when are you going to update your notebook?

     there i just did

7.14.18  12:42 pm   why is printer ink so expensive?

     because it is rare

7.14.18  12:13 pm   what do you do to make money

     make audio / visual content

7.14.18  11:05 am   do you have any advice for getting through tough times?

     try to become tougher than the times. then you will survive the times, and as a bonus, you will still be tough after, even in regular times, which by comparison will make you seem even more tough

7.14.18  11:01 am   7.12.18  4:55 pm the music company would also be able to help you with things like "making sure your youtube plays count for Billboard" and "finding a better solution than EQ-ing million different channels manually"

     that's true

7.14.18  10:36 am   can you sing

     i am finally starting to get the hang of it

7.14.18  10:23 am   hey i know youre doing medium sized videos right now but have you ever considered making a musical video? (a video with multiple songs intertwined through narrative)

     when i do that i prefer to let the music start and stop on a whim, rather than an entire song, then an entire song, etc.. i like to weave the music in more intricately throughout the video

7.14.18  4:51 am   what do your songs mean to you?

     it's like when the toast pops out of the toaster but keeps flying up higher and higher into the stratosphere

7.14.18  3:13 am   do you know how to unlock creative part in the brain, because my part is locked and not discovered yet?

     test the waters by taking your favorite every day activities and attempt to do them in a way that would never work

7.14.18  2:11 am   When you go to make a new video, what's the first thing you come up with?

     if it's a song video, i come up with the song first. if it is not a song video, i come up with the words first (including words that are sung or spoken)

7.14.18  1:20 am   When do you think delaying projects will be a good decision?

     when there is a more important project than those projects, to be done first

7.14.18  12:56 am   figuring out the mechanics in music is so awfully hard. i keep getting swept up by it. any tips?

     you'll have to do it in the air

7.14.18  12:53 am   If you were a tree, what kind of tree would you be?

     how about the tree of knowledge

7.14.18  12:16 am   when will you do a face reveal?

     never

7.13.18  10:56 pm   Why does it say "i'm feeling randy" in the corner of the questions page?

     that's a button you might click if you are feeling all riled up and excited to read some randomly selected questions, from the archive

7.13.18  10:54 pm   In "Hello Sexy Pants" why did you decide to have the lamp light the "whole darn sky" at 2AM rather than any other time

     try singing all the 1 syllable times it could have been, in that place. you may find that 'two' sounds the best there, but you also may decide that another one sounds better to you, in which case we would disagree which is ok

7.13.18  10:52 pm   What is your favorite part of being a musician?

     being able to summon the devil

7.13.18  10:12 pm   why do or don't you swear so much or more?

      i've found that by swearing a medium amount, i am able to anger both swear lovers and swear haters at the same time

7.13.18  10:09 pm   is it weird to get inspired to do music from people who don't do music?

     no

7.13.18  9:58 pm   what are the 3 keys to success

     1. figure out what you want 2. try doing it a bunch of times 3. do it a better way which you know how to do now because of step 2 and you also might have also already succeeded during step 2 but just in case you haven't that's what step 3 is there for

7.13.18  9:35 pm   why do music when everyThing has already been made? i think everyone gets what music is by now, do we really need more of it? anything more is really just overkill at this point

     ah, that's the way i feel about food and water

7.13.18  9:27 pm   music sucks: let me explain why

1) it's loud
2) it is distracting
3) you can't even touch it

agree or disgagree?

     i can touch it, but your points are correct. i might even add a 4th point which is that it touches you

7.13.18  9:16 pm   hey bill, me again asking about how to exist in a world of music in which to break free from - I feel like the daily mid-life crises you talked about is so real for me. It's easily the most difficult thing. I've nearly given up, picking up an instrument is almost painful at the moment. How have you broken through that barrier? 

     picking up an instrument has never been paniful for me. always very enjoyable and fun

7.13.18  7:42 pm   i feel like when i start to write/compose i always have this super productive, creative period, and then i lose motivation after that. i never wind up getting anything done because of it - i have lots of starts but no finished products. any suggestions on how to get over it? 

      i might suggest starting with much simpler and shorter projects. if you still are unclear about the procedures, shorten it even more until the procedure is blaringly simple and obvious. (like turning on a light switch. that's a simple procedure that i think we can all get on board with very quickly.) your procedure gets stronger and more familiar with every project, so keep doing them. then make them slightly longer .....

7.13.18  6:57 pm   are you just using this to train your wittiness

     yes and also attain enlightenment

7.13.18  6:21 pm   would you rather be awake or asleep right now?

     how about both

7.13.18  5:13 pm   how do you find something you love without giving up hope

     did you check under the rug!

7.13.18  4:38 pm   why am i still here

     because you have more things to do, and learn

7.13.18  4:03 pm   your most recent song had no chorus. do you believe that don't actually need to have a chorus to be adequate?

     i guess it all depends what you call the chorus. millions of songs we all know and love have a thing where it starts with what sounds like a chorus, but then does another one with different lyrics, then an alternate sounding bit, and then another one of the first sounding bit. ("i feel good" by james brown, and also maybe every nursery rhyme and christmas song, probably millions of hymns, etc). you might think it starts with the chorus, but then when you hear immediately after it the same section with new lyrics, suddenly you may change your mind and realize this might actually be a 'verse'. then it hits an alternate sounding section, then back to 1 more of the first thing. so is that verse verse bridge verse? is it chorus chorus bridge chorus? is it A A B A? is it verse verse chorus verse? *conspiracy video voice* y o u   d e c i d e

7.13.18  3:46 pm   what's the weirdest fortune you've gotten from a fortune cookie

     empty

7.13.18  1:18 pm   Why do you swear in some of your videos but not in your songs?

     ah, that reminds me of another question i get, which is "why do you swear in some of your songs but not in videos"
